00010 RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::TransFile(const char* fn){
00011 
00012   cout << "Parsing file : "<< fn << endl;
00013   this->filename=fn;
00014   this->currentString="";
00015 
00016   state=TTS_NONE;
00017 
00018   char line[MAX_CHAR_BY_LINE];
00019 
00020   ifstream file(filename);
00021   while(!file.eof()){
00022       file.getline(line, MAX_CHAR_BY_LINE);
00023 
00024       std::string s(line);
00025       treatLine(s);
00026   } 
00027 }
00028 
00034 void RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::treatLine( std::string s){
00035   s=trim(s, " \t" );
00036 
00037     while (!s.empty()){
00038       if (state==TTS_NONE){
00039         s=treatSimpleComm(s);
00040         if (!s.empty())
00041           s=treatMultiComm(s);
00042 
00043         if (!s.empty())
00044           s=treatTR(s);
00045       }
00046       else if (state==TTS_MULTI){
00047         s=treatMultiCommEnd(s);
00048       }
00049       else if(state==TTS_TD_FOUND){
00050         s=treatParentStart(s);
00051       }
00052       else if (state==TTS_PARENT_FOUND){
00053         s=treatString(s);
00054       }
00055       else if (TTS_STRING_FOUND){
00056         s=treatParentEnd(s);
00057       }
00058     }
00059 }

00069 std::string RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::trim( const std::string & str , 
00070                                                 char const* sepSet){
00071 
00072   std::string::size_type const first = str.find_first_not_of(sepSet);
00073   return ( first==std::string::npos )
00074     ? std::string()
00075     : str.substr(first, str.find_last_not_of(sepSet)-first+1);
00076 }

00088 std::string RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::
00089 treatMultiComm( const std::string & str ){
00090   std::string::size_type const first=str.find("/*" );
00091 
00092   // Trouve
00093   if (first!=std::string::npos){
00094     state=TTS_MULTI;
00095     return str.substr(0, first);
00096   }
00097   else{
00098     return string(str);
00099   }
00100 }

00112 std::string RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::
00113 treatMultiCommEnd( const std::string & str ){
00114 
00115   std::string::size_type const first=str.find("*/" );
00116 
00117   // Trouve
00118   if (first!=std::string::npos){
00119 
00120     string ret(str);
00121     ret.erase(0, first+2);
00122 
00123     state=TTS_NONE;
00124     return ret;
00125   }
00126   else{
00127     return string("");
00128   }
00129 }

00141 std::string RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::
00142 treatSimpleComm( const std::string & str ){
00143 
00144   std::string::size_type const first=str.find("//" );
00145 
00146   // Trouve
00147   if (first!=std::string::npos){
00148 
00149     string ret=str.substr(0, first);
00150 
00151     state=TTS_NONE;
00152     return trim(ret, " \t");
00153   }
00154   else{
00155     return string(str);
00156   }
00157 
00158 }

00167 std::string RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::
00168 treatTR( const std::string & str ){
00169   std::string::size_type const first=str.find("TR" );
00170 
00171   // Trouve
00172   if (first!=std::string::npos){
00173 
00174     string ret(str);
00175     ret.erase(0, first+2);
00176     state=TTS_TD_FOUND;
00177     return ret;
00178   }
00179   else{
00180     return string("");

00192 std::string RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::
00193 treatParentStart( const std::string& str ){
00194   std::string::size_type const first=str.find("(" );
00195 
00196   // Trouve
00197   if (first!=std::string::npos){
00198 
00199     string ret(str);
00200     ret.erase(0, first+1);
00201     state=TTS_PARENT_FOUND;
00202     return ret;
00203   }
00204   else{
00205     LOGW("Cannot find a parenthese after a TR tag");
00206     return string(str);
00207   }
00208 }

00219 std::string RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::
00220 treatString( const std::string& str ){
00221   std::string::size_type const first=str.find('"' );
00222   std::string::size_type const last=str.find('"', first+1 );
00223   string ret=str;
00224 
00225   if (first!=std::string::npos && last!=std::string::npos){
00226     state=TTS_STRING_FOUND;
00227     string found=str.substr(first+1, last-first-1);
00228     currentString+=found;
00229     ret=str;
00230     ret.erase(0, last+1);
00231   }
00232   return ret;
00233 
00234 }
00235 
00245 std::string RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::
00246 treatParentEnd( const std::string& s ){
00247   std::string str;
00248 
00249   // recall treatString if a '"' is founs
00250   std::string::size_type const guil=s.find('"' );
00251   if (guil!=std::string::npos){
00252     str=treatString(s);
00253   }
00254   else
00255     str=s;
00256 
00257   // search a parenthese
00258   std::string::size_type const first=str.find(")" );
00259 
00260   // Trouve
00261   if (first!=std::string::npos){
00262     stringFound();
00263     string ret("");
00264     state=TTS_NONE;
00265     return ret;
00266   }
00267   else{
00268     return string("");
00269   }
00270 }

00278 void RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile::
00279 stringFound(){
00280   cout << "String-to-translate found :" << currentString << endl;
00281   currentString="";
00282 
00283 }
